nodes.text: Jerome Blake played Mas Amedda in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and Revenge of the Sith. He also played Oppo Rancisis in Episode I and II, and Rune Haako, Mik Regrap, Horox Ryyder, Graxol Kelvynn, and Orn Free Taa in Episode I.

Blake is set to play Darth Vader in Richard LeParmentier's fan film Motti Now. He was born in 1956 in England and has played minor roles in many different films and commercials. He is usually under a mask or being the voice of a character, and is therefore rarely recognized in public. For many years he was musician and at age 36 became a model.
